name: VOID RUNNER (sleepyrogue, kodiak425)
description:
VOID RUNNER

Space Johnson decides to boot up his favorite simulation, but this time things are a bit... buggy... He's trapped in the game and the simulation is breaking down! Bounce off walls, slingshot around planets, and outrun the sim-muncher to help him escape with his life!

How To Play:

Aim thrusters by moving the mouse.

Thrust: Left Click

Reset: R

Collect Gas Cans to refill your gas gauge. If you run out you only have a few seconds before your ship destabilizes and explodes!

Collect Space Dynamite to blow up cracked walls.

Credits:

Design/Programming: Trenton Coggeshall and Trevor Irvin

Art: Trevor Irvin

Music: Kevin MacLeod

Made in 72 hours for Mini Jam 97: Simulation. 

(The build that is playable in the browser was updated a half hour after the deadline with the following bugfixes: music now loops, thruster sound was cleaned up, and the minimap on one level was fixed)
